string.description.discord.command.kick: Kicks the specified user from the corresponding server.
string.discord.command.kick.success.embedbody: The user, **${user}**, has been kicked from **${guild}** for **${reason}**
string.discord.command.kick.error.unspecifiedus: The user that you provided was invalid! Please specify a valid user/ID.
string.discord.command.kick.error.problemoccure: An error occurred when using this command.
string.discord.command.kick.error.ratelimit: You're currently on cooldown! You have **${seconds}** left before you can use another command.
string.discord.command.kick.error.alreadyunbann: That user has either already been kicked, or wasn't in the server whatsoever!
string.discord.command.kick.error.botmissingreq: I am missing the `KICK_PERMISSION` permission. Please turn that on so I can kick said person.
string.discord.command.kick.error.usermissingre: You are missing the `KICK_PERMISSION` permission. Please have the required permission so you can kick that person.
